website_summaries.verdict: High quality, non-toxic aromatherapy candles that are beautifully packaged and comes with 4 candles in different scents, making it a great option for gifting as a set or individually.
pros: Comes in an attractive box with each candle in a unique decorative tin holder
Food grade soy wax and lead-free cotton wicks are non-toxic and long lasting
4 different scents offer an aromatherapy experience for every mood
Ribbon and blank gift card are a nice touch
cons: The candles are on the smaller side, but that's only to be expected of a gift set

customer_reviews.title: Smell Awesome
customer_reviews.text: These all smell delicately delightful! The jars feel heavy/sturdy and can be used for something else,after the candle burns away
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for gifting
customer_reviews.text: Really nice little gift set. I bought it as one of the prizes for a bridal shower I was hosting. The box and designs on each candle were pretty. I actually smelled all the candles, very nice and strong smell. I have plans to already buy again for a few Christmas gifts!
customer_reviews.author: mama4x4

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful candles with a matching gift box
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for a coworker. I opened one of the candles and it smelled so good. I was tempted to keep it for myself. The box is very pretty, it is floral that matches the candles. Each little kid on the candle is on really good, maybe even air tight. Each candle has a ribbon sticking out of it to help with the opening of the lids. The design on the outside is the lovely floral, each one being a different color. I just know my coworker will love these. I do.
customer_reviews.author: B. Norman

customer_reviews.title: A nice gift idea.
customer_reviews.text: Got them for my mother for mother's day. She really like them. Thank you Guys. I would buy again. Update. I would buy again at the price I purchase them at. Was $18 bucks. Because they're a little on the small side. But I did buy them for my Mother I would spend a little more. If so I would find bigger candles.
customer_reviews.author: Bigworm

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with candles.
customer_reviews.text: I probably would never order this for myself because I stick to particular scents that I enjoy and don't feel like exploring much. Ordered this as a gift for a colleague for Secret Santa at work. It was a nice gift, came well-packaged and she appeared to be quite happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Regina

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Super cute!! And feels like very nice quality! They smell sooo lovely too! Gifted to my friend for her birthday she loves candles! And she loves them so much! Definitely would recommend for a gift! Or even just for yourself! They are super cute candles!
customer_reviews.author: tifani greenwood

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Candles
customer_reviews.text: Candle tins and the packaging is beautiful. Very well put together. Candles burn without a lot of smoke, but they don't have a real strong scent. Purchased to put in office goodie bags. Perfect size and great price!
customer_reviews.author: Tippy

customer_reviews.title: Easy and pretty gift
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift! Everyone wanted to smell them and loved it! The presentation is very pretty and overall for the value makes a wonderful easy gift! Love that it comes in a pretty box!!! That’s a plus
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Boggs

customer_reviews.title: suitable for giving as a gift
customer_reviews.text: I received it today it was fast. The package was so surprised; It is a great box of candles, Very giftable and Presented nicely. I bought it for my sister; she is getting married I think she will like it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Lovely set. Perfect gift. Beautifully packaged. Fast delivery.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect inexpensive gift. Beautifully packaged. No need to wrap. Just pop on a bow.
customer_reviews.author: Gina MAC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 for a perfect Christmas gift. The price is right and great quality. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth P.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, beautiful gift !
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, excellent packaging and presentation. Great stocking stuffers ! Everyone loves them !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product, I got what was described. Smells are amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Good product, I got what was described. Smells are amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Burkeen

customer_reviews.title: S
customer_reviews.text: These candles are a great gift idea! Great price. Smile great! Can be given as one gift or 4 small gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gifting
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful scent for each candle. Made a very nice gift
customer_reviews.author: Enam Hussain

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: Smelt great and the package was so cute. Smaller then expected tho
customer_reviews.author: Bailey Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Great gifts
customer_reviews.text: I bought three gift boxes for friends and family. They all loved the candles. They're a little pricey, but worth the money. Very pleased and will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: does not smell good, y’all!
customer_reviews.text: the scents are terrible. super cute packaging & nice floral tins, but the scents are gross.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but bland
customer_reviews.text: While they come in very pretty tins inside a very pretty box, each of them has a very faint scent. Not enough to scent the air (in my opinion)
customer_reviews.author: Southern Girl

customer_reviews.title: Best scented candle ever
customer_reviews.text: The product has amazing aroma. The product was delivered in this cute gift box which was the cutest part. The candles smell great. I put in the bathroom and it smells like heaven! Best product and I 200% recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Deepa Elango

customer_reviews.title: OK ... I guess
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved the packaging. I would definitely gift these candles to my mom/grandma as a gift. However I was disappointed at how small the candles actually are. Anyhow overall OK
customer_reviews.author: Galen Heflin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent gift idea!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, wonderful gift idea, beautifully boxed, and reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: SuperMario

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Birthday Gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a birthday gift for my sister. She loved them and got many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Lapotaire

customer_reviews.title: Not great scent
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t love the scents as much as I thought I would. Packaging is very pretty though!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No scent
customer_reviews.text: These candles are cute but the scents are hardly noticeable. Just smells like wax...
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Fast on time not broken, great for little gift ideas!
customer_reviews.author: chris plocienik

customer_reviews.title: Presentation
customer_reviews.text: I loved how authentic the box was. Would definitely buy as a gift again.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Sauve

customer_reviews.title: Yuck.
customer_reviews.text: These candles made my apartment smell like a meth lab. Spend more to get better!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Godwin-Beckford

customer_reviews.title: Nice packaging
customer_reviews.text: The candles were packaged in a nice arrangement. The scent of the candles was excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: She loved it!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift, but I know she was thrilled. Great job!
customer_reviews.author: nicki stuvland

customer_reviews.title: Smell Amazing
customer_reviews.text: They smell amazing! Now let's hope my mom enjoys them for Christmas!🤞🏻
customer_reviews.author: kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Hardly any scent
customer_reviews.text: They are packed well and when you open the box, there is a nice aromatic smell. But when lit there is not scent other than smoke. I would not recommend this to any one
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money on this!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very very disappointed in this! The reviews were good so I bought 4 for my co workers for Christmas. 3 of them came back after using the candles and said there was no scent in them! The box was pretty and when you opened the box you could smell the candle but once it was lit, no scent at all!! Very embarrassing since they were given as gifts. Wish I could return them. Very upset about this.
customer_reviews.author: Pthomas

customer_reviews.title: A little pricey for the performance
customer_reviews.text: I thought the smell of all of these would be excellent, but one of these I burned we didn’t smell at all. The vanilla one is excellent. I wish there was just a big vanilla one or a box of all vanilla.
customer_reviews.author: Tanesha.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: This product was soooo horrible I have to return it ASAP! I thought I’d at least find one that I liked smh nope! Nope nope! Don’t even bother honestly every scent gave me a headache so much that they all started seem to smell exactly the same
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.text: Candles were very small, really didn’t get a scent from them That was noticeable anyway. However, they came in a really neat and cute gift box. Makes a nice gift but I wouldn’t purchase again. Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Nik

customer_reviews.title: The packaging was very bad
customer_reviews.text: The packaging was very bad so the candles were broken. I didn't like the scent at all. Overall the quality is bad
customer_reviews.author: tama

customer_reviews.title: Good classic familiar smells!
customer_reviews.text: These candles are more like the candle flavors that I am used to, roses and vanillas, but much softer and not so smack you in the face which I enjoy a great deal. A lot of the candles out right now are in these little tins which are so cute and colorful! My color palette for my house is very, how do you say, BORING! Now these little tins are livening it up a bit with some old familiar scents!
customer_reviews.author: Corinne Cruz

customer_reviews.title: attractive gift
customer_reviews.text: I didn't feel that the aroma of the candles were strong enough nor did they last very long.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my sister. She loves camouflage deco. They are beautiful and smell amazing. She loves them!! Packaged nicely! Very good price and cute!
customer_reviews.author: brianna

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful gift!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a thank you gift. So nice I bought several more for Christmas gifts when price was right. 10-13 dollars
customer_reviews.author: grandmananny

customer_reviews.title: Sent Used!!!!
customer_reviews.text: CAME USED Oh my gosh!!!...I gave this as a gift and when my friend opened the lid the wick was black and had been used!!! Yes I was mortified. However, they are in beautiful containers.
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful packaging & got my money’s worth
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful packaging 😍 & appropriate size of candles for the amount of money payed for them 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Tayisiya

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gift
customer_reviews.text: Love how easy and cute this was to give as a gift
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hynes

product_meta.title: Aromatherapy Scented Candles Gift Sets, Essential Oil Stress Relief Candle, 17.6Oz Soy Wax Travel Tin Relaxing Candle for Bath Spa Meditation, Birthday Relaxation Candle Gifts for Women
feature_bullets: 🌺【4 FRAGRANCES SCENTS】:Scented candles gift set with 4 pack,which includes Freesia, Lavender, Rosemary, French Vanilla.
🌺【SOY WAX CANDLES】:Made of 100% soy wax, harmless to human body and environment. Evenly burning Aromatherapy Candles Set brings warmth to your home and great for stress relief.
🌺【LONG LASTING TIME】: L2.95’’ x H 2.08’’, 120g (4.4oz) per candle.Burn Hour: 120 hours. Provide aromatherapy to create a romantic atmosphere that brings you a different experience and life.

🌺【PORTABLE REUSABLE TRAVEL TIN 】: The scented candle package is very cute,suit for decorating your home or store some little things once used up.A portable travel tin candle, which can be sealed and taken with you wherever you go.

🌺【PERFECT GIFT SET】: Aromatherapy candle set comes well packaged and gift wrapped.They are appropriate for any holiday or special event,such as birthday, holiday, anniversary , christmas，valentine's Day Gift，Mother's Day gift or just to say thank you to anyone.
